name.ja: WhatsApp用連絡先エクスポーター

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export WhatsApp contacts from groups, chats, contacts and labels lists to CSV or VCard format.
short.es,es_419: Exporta contactos de WhatsApp desde grupos, chats, listas de contactos y etiquetas a formato CSV o VCard.
short.ja: グループ、チャット、連絡先リスト、ラベルからWhatsApp連絡先をCSVまたはVCard形式でエクスポート。
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Exporte contatos do WhatsApp de grupos, conversas, lista de contatos e etiquetas para formato CSV ou VCard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily export your WhatsApp contacts with our simple tool. Save contacts from groups, chats, contacts and labels lists as CSV spreadsheets for data management, or VCard files for seamless import to your phone and email clients. The perfect solution for backing up business contacts and group members.

👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Export Contacts from Groups
✓ Export Contacts from Chats
✓ Export Contacts from Contacts
✓ Export Contacts from Labels
✓ Export Contacts to CSV & Vcard

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

📃 Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 10 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

ℹ️ Disclaimer
WA Contacts Extractor is an independent third-party Chrome extension and has no affiliation with WhatsApp, Meta Platforms, Inc., or their affiliated companies. All trademarks and brand names mentioned are the property of their respective owners.
